attributes.name: Fanatic's Kite Shield
attributes.name_with_affixes: Fanatic's Kite Shield of the Soldier
attributes.description: "His eagerness to spread the message of his faith was equal only to his willingness to denouce those who did not share it."
attributes.parsed_description: "His eagerness to spread the message of his faith was equal only to his willingness to denouce those who did not share it."

attributes.name_with_affixes: Fanatic's Round Shield of the Soldier
attributes.description: "His eagerness to spread the message of his faith was equal only to his willingness to denouce those who did not share it."

attributes.name: Fanatic's War  Hammer
attributes.name_with_affixes: Fanatic's War  Hammer of the Soldier
attributes.description: "His eagerness to spread the message of his faith was equal only to his willingness to denouce those who did not share it."
attributes.parsed_description: "His eagerness to spread the message of his faith was equal only to his willingness to denouce those who did not share it."

attributes.name: Farcleaver
attributes.description: "It quivers like a live thing in the hand, eager to take a life."
attributes.parsed_description: "It quivers like a live thing in the hand, eager to take a life."

attributes.name: Farmer Bob's Corrupted Shooter
attributes.description: "Shoot 'em dead!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Shoot 'em dead!"

attributes.name: Farmer Russo's Rusty Great Axe
attributes.description: "Sometimes a pitchfork ain't enough to keep the Lost at bay."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sometimes a pitchfork ain't enough to keep the Lost at bay."

attributes.name: Farmer's Hope
attributes.description: "Bandits descended on the farm, prepared to steal all the farmer had worked to grow. She gripped her trusty friend and prepared to fight."
attributes.parsed_description: "Bandits descended on the farm, prepared to steal all the farmer had worked to grow. She gripped her trusty friend and prepared to fight."

attributes.name: Farseer's Spear
attributes.description: "Gaze into my crystals and see your future."
attributes.parsed_description: "Gaze into my crystals and see your future."

attributes.name: Fates Design
attributes.description: "As you draw the bowstring taught, the threads of reality splay before you. Which fate do you choose?"
attributes.parsed_description: "As you draw the bowstring taught, the threads of reality splay before you. Which fate do you choose?"

attributes.name: Fay's Covenant
attributes.description: "May the bearer of this rapier watch over the land's bounty and protect it from those who would cause imbalance."
attributes.parsed_description: "May the bearer of this rapier watch over the land's bounty and protect it from those who would cause imbalance."

attributes.name: Fearful Breath
attributes.description: "It will be sharp and cold when you inhale. That is the taste of fear."
attributes.parsed_description: "It will be sharp and cold when you inhale. That is the taste of fear."

attributes.name: Fear of Peace
attributes.description: "Assassinating a Duke is like killing anyone else. It never gets easier. For some of us, it was never hard in the first place."
attributes.parsed_description: "Assassinating a Duke is like killing anyone else. It never gets easier. For some of us, it was never hard in the first place."

attributes.name: Fearreaver
attributes.description: "Let not the timid wield me."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let not the timid wield me."

attributes.name: Fearwarden
attributes.description: "Stand tall, for you have nothing to fear."
attributes.parsed_description: "Stand tall, for you have nothing to fear."

attributes.name: Feral Demeanor
attributes.description: "They fight with a savagery that we have not seen before."
attributes.parsed_description: "They fight with a savagery that we have not seen before."

attributes.name: Feral Flintlock
attributes.description: "Beastial features adorn the musket."
attributes.parsed_description: "Beastial features adorn the musket."

attributes.name: Ferocity of the Impaler
attributes.description: "A bow formed from corrupted matter. Its arrows impale pure corrupted essence into the wielder's enemies."
attributes.parsed_description: "A bow formed from corrupted matter. Its arrows impale pure corrupted essence into the wielder's enemies."

attributes.name: Ferret's Firey Longbow
attributes.description: "You'd think that a flaming bow would be an inefficient way to hunt a creature as small as a feret... And you'd be right!"
attributes.parsed_description: "You'd think that a flaming bow would be an inefficient way to hunt a creature as small as a feret... And you'd be right!"

attributes.name: Fever
attributes.description: "The fever took him by storm, draining him of all his energy."
attributes.parsed_description: "The fever took him by storm, draining him of all his energy."

attributes.name: Fiendish Slicer
attributes.description: "This battlescarred piece of steel is coated in layers of blood that no one has attempted to clean."
attributes.parsed_description: "This battlescarred piece of steel is coated in layers of blood that no one has attempted to clean."

attributes.name: Fiery Beauty
attributes.description: "This staff is pretty, but nothing compares to the elegance of a dancing flame."
attributes.parsed_description: "This staff is pretty, but nothing compares to the elegance of a dancing flame."

attributes.name: Fiery Ghoul's Gravestaff
attributes.description: "A fiery death is among the worst ways to perish."
attributes.parsed_description: "A fiery death is among the worst ways to perish."

attributes.name: Fiery Rapier
attributes.description: "Sparks dance from the blade."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sparks dance from the blade."

attributes.name: Fiery Sermon
attributes.description: "Fire and brimstone shall be yours should you foolishly choose to join the Tempest!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Fire and brimstone shall be yours should you foolishly choose to join the Tempest!"

attributes.name: Fiery Temper
attributes.description: "Quick to anger and quick to knock an arrow."
attributes.parsed_description: "Quick to anger and quick to knock an arrow."

attributes.name: Final Light
attributes.description: "Watch as the lights go out."
attributes.parsed_description: "Watch as the lights go out."

attributes.name: Final Respite
attributes.description: "Rest now."
attributes.parsed_description: "Rest now."

attributes.name: Final Waltz
attributes.description: "Come, let us dance. You can follow my lead."
attributes.parsed_description: "Come, let us dance. You can follow my lead."

attributes.name: Firebinder
attributes.description: "I can control fire."
attributes.parsed_description: "I can control fire."

attributes.name: Firebound Spellstaff
attributes.description: "Master the art of pyromancy and the whole world can be yours."
attributes.parsed_description: "Master the art of pyromancy and the whole world can be yours."

attributes.name: Firebrand
attributes.description: "She walked among the flames unburned. It was as though they embraced her."
attributes.parsed_description: "She walked among the flames unburned. It was as though they embraced her."

attributes.name: Fire Crystal Spell Staff
attributes.description: "The blazing hot crystal at the edge of the staff radiates pure chaotic energy."
attributes.parsed_description: "The blazing hot crystal at the edge of the staff radiates pure chaotic energy."

attributes.name: Firefrost
attributes.description: "This staff is an anomaly, a permanently burning piece of ice. Impressive."
attributes.parsed_description: "This staff is an anomaly, a permanently burning piece of ice. Impressive."

attributes.name: Fire Lord's Staff
attributes.description: "Formerly wielded by the strongest pyromancer in recorded history. He nearly conquered the entire world before a brave young hero stopped him."
attributes.parsed_description: "Formerly wielded by the strongest pyromancer in recorded history. He nearly conquered the entire world before a brave young hero stopped him."

attributes.name: Fire of Darkness
attributes.description: "There is but one light in the cruel darkness; my staff."
attributes.parsed_description: "There is but one light in the cruel darkness; my staff."

attributes.name: Fires of Retaliation
attributes.description: "An eye for an eye makes the whole world burn."
attributes.parsed_description: "An eye for an eye makes the whole world burn."

attributes.name: Fire Staff
attributes.description: A vestige of an ancient civilization that had mastered pyromancy.
attributes.parsed_description: A vestige of an ancient civilization that had mastered pyromancy.
